property.html:
#macro (printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) #end
Filename Document Uploaded by Upload Date Infection Type
$escapetool.xml($attachment.filename) $escapetool.xml($attachment.document.plainTitle)$escapetool.xml($xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference)) $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) $escapetool.xml($attachmentsMapEntry.value)
#end

Hello, admin of the wiki $wikiUrl.

This is an email informing you that attachment files in documents of your wiki have been detected as being infected with viruses or malware.

In order to remove the threat, the infected files have been automatically DELETED.

#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

List of attachments that FAILED to be deleted:

#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Please check the server logs for more information on the reason why the delete operation failed.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

List of attachments that were successfully deleted:

#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments) #end

Please see the Antivirus Administration section in your wiki for more options.

Thanks,
XWiki Antivirus Application

property.subject: [VIRUS DETECTED] XWiki scheduled antivirus scan report

property.text:
#macro(printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) * $attachment.filename from document $attachment.document.plainTitle ($attachment.document.externalURL) uploaded by $xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference) ($xwiki.xWiki.getExternalURL($authorReference, 'view', $xcontext.context)) on $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) infected with $attachmentsMapEntry.value #end #end Hello, admin of the wiki $wikiUrl.
This is an email informing you that attachment files in documents of your wiki have been detected as being infected with viruses or malware.
In order to remove the threat, the infected files have been automatically DELETED.
#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) List of attachments that FAILED to be deleted:
#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Please check the server logs for more information on the reason why the delete operation failed.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) List of attachments that were successfully deleted:
#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments)
#end Please see the Antivirus Administration section in your wiki for more options: $adminUrl
Thanks, XWiki Antivirus Application

property.html:
#macro (printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) #end
Nom du fichier Document Téléchargé par Date de téléchargement Type d'infection
$escapetool.xml($attachment.filename) $escapetool.xml($attachment.document.plainTitle)$escapetool.xml($xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference)) $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) $escapetool.xml($attachmentsMapEntry.value)
#end

Bonjour, administrateur du wiki $wikiUrl.

Ceci est une notification vous informant que des pièces jointes dans des documents de votre wiki ont été détectées comme étant infectées par des virus ou des logiciels malveillants.

Afin de supprimer la menace, les fichiers infectés ont été automatiquement SUPPRIMÉS.

#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

Liste des pièces jointes qui ont ÉCHOUÉ à supprimer:

#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Consultez les journaux du serveur pour plus d'informations sur la raison de l'échec de l'opération de suppression.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

Liste des pièces jointes supprimées avec succès:

#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments) #end

Veuillez consulter la section d'administration Antivirus de votre wiki pour plus d'options.

Cordialement,
L'application d'Antivirus pour XWiki

property.subject: [VIRUS DÉTECTÉ] Rapport d'analyse antivirus planifié XWiki

property.text:
#macro(printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) * $attachment.filename du document $attachment.document.plainTitle ($attachment.document.externalURL) chargé par $xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference) ($xwiki.xWiki.getExternalURL($authorReference, 'view', $xcontext.context)) à $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) infecté par $attachmentsMapEntry.value #end #end Bonjour, administrateur du wiki $wikiUrl.
Ceci est une notification vous informant que des pièces jointes dans des documents de votre wiki ont été détectées comme étant infectées par des virus ou des logiciels malveillants.
Afin de supprimer la menace, les fichiers infectés ont été automatiquement SUPPRIMÉS.
#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) Liste des pièces jointes qui ont ÉCHOUÉ à supprimer:
#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Consultez les journaux du serveur pour plus d'informations sur la raison de l'échec de l'opération de suppression.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) Liste des pièces jointes supprimées avec succès:
#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments)
#end Veuillez consulter la section d'administration Antivirus de votre wiki pour plus d'options: $adminUrl
Cordialement, L'application d'Antivirus pour XWiki

property.html:
#macro (printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) #end
Nume fişier Document Ataşat de Data ataşării Tipul infecţiei
$escapetool.xml($attachment.filename) $escapetool.xml($attachment.document.plainTitle)$escapetool.xml($xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference)) $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) $escapetool.xml($attachmentsMapEntry.value)
#end

Bună, administrator al wiki-ului $wikiUrl.

Acest mesaj vă informează în legatură cu faptul că fişiere ataşate la documente din wiki-ul dumneavoastră au fost detectate drept infectate cu virusuri sau programe malware.

Pentru a îndepărta pericolul, fişierele infectate au fost în mod automat ŞTERSE.

#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

Lista de ataşamente pentru care ştergerea a EŞUAT:

#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Verificaţi jurnalele server-ului pentru mai multe informaţii despre motivul pentru care operaţiuna de ştergere a eşuat.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0)

Lista de ataşamente care au fost şterse cu succes:

#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments) #end

Pentru mai multe opţiuni, consultaţi secţiunea de administrare Antivirus din wiki-ul dumneavoastră.

Vă mulţumim,
Aplicaţia de Antivirus pentru XWiki

property.subject: [VIRUS DETECTAT] Raport scanare periodică antivirus XWiki

property.text:
#macro(printAttachments $attachmentsMap) #foreach ($attachmentsMapEntry in $attachmentsMap.entrySet()) #set ($attachment = $attachmentsMapEntry.key) #set ($authorReference = $attachment.attachment.authorReference) * $attachment.filename din documentul $attachment.document.plainTitle ($attachment.document.externalURL) ataşat de $xwiki.getPlainUserName($authorReference) ($xwiki.xWiki.getExternalURL($authorReference, 'view', $xcontext.context)) pe $xwiki.formatDate($attachment.date) infectat cu $attachmentsMapEntry.value #end #end Bună, administrator al wiki-ului $wikiUrl.
Acest mesaj vă informează în legatură cu faptul că fişiere ataşate la documente din wiki-ul dumneavoastră au fost detectate drept infectate cu virusuri sau programe malware.
Pentru a îndepărta pericolul, fişierele infectate au fost în mod automat ŞTERSE.
#if ($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) Lista de ataşamente pentru care ştergerea a EŞUAT:
#printAttachments($deleteFailedInfectedAttachments)
Verificaţi jurnalele server-ului pentru mai multe informaţii despre motivul pentru care operaţiuna de ştergere a eşuat.
#end #if ($deletedInfectedAttachments.size() > 0) Lista de ataşamente care au fost şterse cu succes:
#printAttachments($deletedInfectedAttachments)
#end Pentru mai multe opţiuni, consultaţi secţiunea de administrare Antivirus din wiki-ul dumneavoastră: $adminUrl
Vă mulţumim, Aplicaţia de Antivirus pentru XWiki
